question: How can I win on Cashingames?
answer: Winning on Cashingames is very easy. You choose the category you’re most knowledgeable in, answer the questions and you stand a chance to win. The more questions you answer, the more you increase your winnings.

question: Why should I refer my friends to play and is it a must?
answer: Referring your friends to Cashingames helps them make money too and besides what are friends for?. It is not a must to refer your friends but you receive at least ₦200 per successful referral.

question: How much can I win? (Is there a limit to it?)
answer: Winning on Cashingames is very easy. You choose the category you’re most knowledgeable in, answer the questions and you stand a chance to win. The more questions you answer, the more you increase your winnings.

question: Can I play all day?
answer: Yes, you can. The world of trivia on Cashingames is open to you 24 hrs 7 days a week.

question: I don’t have a Cashingames account. Do I need one?
answer: Yes, you need one so you can be eligible to play and also withdraw your winnings.

question: How quickly am I paid when I win on Cashingames?
answer: You receive your cash prizes at the end of your daily participation.

question: Can I create a quiz or trivia on Cashingames?
answer: Yes, you can create a quiz on Cashingames and we will love it if you send in your suggestions on what questions to ask in your favourite categories.

question: How can I send in my questions or suggestions?
answer: You can send in your questions via our email to dumebi@cashingames.com

question: How can I contact customer care?
answer: You can call our customer care on +234(0)817 959 0128 or send an email to dumebi@cashingames.com

question: What is the minimum amount I can withdraw from my winnings?
answer: The minimum amount you can withdraw for now is ₦2,000.00

question: Can I withdraw my signup bonus?
answer: No, you cannot withdraw your sign up bonus because it is required to explore other features on Cashingames.

question: Can I withdraw my referral bonus?
answer: No, you cannot withdraw your referral bonus until it matures up to ₦2000.

question: Can I change my username?
answer: Yes, you are allowed to change your username. However, to ensure you maintain your winning track record, it’s best you limit the number of times you do. There could be winning prizes for longest top winner.

question: How will I fund my wallet?
answer: You can fund your wallet by clicking the “fund” tab in your wallet.

question: Why should I link my Bank account to Cashingames?
answer: This is important so you can be able to withdraw your cash prizes.
